WoW our VPS prices has been dropped down on 512MB and 1GB plans the new prices are $14.95/m for 512MB Plan and $29.95/m for 1GB Plan.

All nodes are equipped with 2 x Quad Core CPUs to 4 x Quad Core CPUs, 24-48GB RAM and RAID10 arrays. All resources are dedicated and each VPS comes with VPS Management Panel.

- Windows Server 2008 Enterprise Edition x64 (64bit)

Web Based VPS Management Panel:
- Hard Reboot / Soft Reboot
- View CPU Utilization / Memory Utilization / Disk space Allocation
